description: Convert and extract JSON fields using JQ queries.

input_value.info: Data object or Message to filter. Can be a single item or a list.

query.info: JQ Query to filter the data. The input is processed as JSON and can be queried using JQ syntax.

success.data_filtered: Successfully filtered JSON data using query '{query}'. Generated {results} result(s).

warnings.empty_input: No input data provided for filtering.

errors.list_item_parsing_failed: Failed to parse list item at index {index}: {error}
errors.list_json_parsing_failed: Failed to parse JSON at list index {index}: {error}
errors.result_conversion_failed: Failed to convert result at index {index} to Data object: {error}
